title: Great World Playland: A Traveling Edutainment Area
blurb: Globe trotter and travel around Great World Playland!
description: Located at Level 2, Great World Playland offers a traveling edutainment experience for kids aged 3 to 12. Children can explore and learn about transportation through features like a train and hot air balloon. The playland is open daily from 9am to 10pm, but closed during rainy or lightning weather. Capture fun moments at #GWPlayland. It provides an engaging and educational environment where children can learn and play. The area is designed to stimulate creativity and curiosity, making it a perfect destination for families.
datetime_display: Open daily from 9am – 10pm. Closed during rainy or lightning weather.

title: Great World Playland at Great World City Mall
blurb: Explore the traveling edutainment area for kids!
description: Located at Level 2, Great World Playland offers a traveling edutainment area where kids can learn about transportation. Suitable for children aged 3 to 12 years old, the playland features a train and hot air balloon. Capture fun moments at #GWPlayland. The playland is open daily from 9am to 10pm but closed during rainy or lightning weather. The Roof Terrace located at Level 3 (after My Gym) is an outdoor terrace adorned with cute animal topiaries and photo spots. Open daily from 9am to 10pm. Closed during rainy or lightning weather.

title: Great World Roof Terrace Relaxation and Photo Spot
blurb: Relax at our outdoor terrace with animal topiaries.
description: Located at Level 3 (after My Gym), relax at our outdoor terrace adorned with cute animal topiaries and photo spots. Open daily from 9am – 10pm. Closed during rainy or lightning weather. Diaper Changing & Nursing Rooms are located at Basement 1, Level 1 and Level 2. Parents can look forward to a comfortable, private area to care for your baby or child with accessible facilities and equipment such as basin, hot water dispenser, diaper changing stations and nursing rooms.

title: Minmed Paediatrics at Great World City
blurb: Paediatric services for newborns, babies, toddlers.
description: Minmed Paediatrics, located at Basement 2, provides same-day appointment bookings for a wide range of services catered to newborns, babies, toddlers and children. Parents can also look forward to specialised services such as Sleep Training and Allergy Test from an experienced Paediatrician. Visit their website for more details on available services and booking information. They offer comprehensive care for your child's health and well-being in a convenient location within Great World City.
